1.content:
Driven from the Lylat system by a freak warp-storm, both Star Fox and Star Wolf teams now appear at a planet named to them Sol 3 or Earth. Both teams send reckon groups to the planet's surface to study the planet's inhabitants and get equipment to repair their ships.

While in the Alaska (U.S.A) a secret military research, the year is 2014, and for 5 years the U.S government has been researching a secret project on a captured British tourist captured in 2009, at the age of 16. Now at the age of twenty-one he has given up all hope.

The Star Fox Team intercepted a message and at the moment is raided the base for the most advanced technology on earth and is about to stumble across the research project.

Who's point of view do you wish to follow?
1.title: Prologue

11.content: What will the project look like?
11.title: The Research project

info.brief_description: Star Fox team dicovers earth and a research project
info.description:
This is set a few years after 'Star Fox Adventures'.
The research project's look I leave up to you.

Rules:
No sexual content
No bad spelling or grammar
No short chaptures
